Detailed Description

Abstract class for plugins wishing to have access to a 'grid' for drawing.

An abstract class that implements the 'grid' which is a 2d array of rectangles. Subclasses have access to the setupGrid() and drawGrid() methods, along with the setGrayLevel() and setColor() methods. See the MovingGrating class for a class that uses the 'grid'.

Member Function Documentation

void GridPlugin::setupGrid ( int  low,
int  left,
int  xWidth,
int  yWidth,
int  xNumber,
int  yNumber 
) [protected]

Define the grid and setup its data structures.

Call this before you can call setGrayLevel(), setColor(), or drawGrid(). This method sets up the vertex arrays and color array defining the grid rectangles.

Parameters:
low - the y coordinate of the bottom of the grid
left - the x coordinate of the leftmost part of the grid
xWidth - the width in pixels of the grid along the x dimension
yWidth - the height in pixels of the grid along the y dimension
xNumber - the number of grid rectangles in the x direction. xWidth/xNumber determines the width of each grid rectangle.
yNumber - the number of grid rectangles in the y direction. yWidth/yNumber determines the height of each grid rectangle
